languages.text: "Даже если я обладаю "частицей огня" — то только потому, что хочу ее использовать в своих целях".
"Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."
languages.original_text: "Даже если я обладаю "частицей огня" — то только потому, что хочу ее использовать в своих целях".

traits.locale_text: "Even if I do possess this 'lick of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."
"Even if I do possess this 'lick of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."
"Even if I do possess this 'lick of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."
"Even if I do possess this 'lick of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."
"Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."
"Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."

languages.text: « Même si je possède cette "étincelle de flamme", c'est simplement parce que je compte l'utiliser à mes fins. »
languages.original_text: "Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."

traits.locale_text: « Même si je possède ce "brandon de flamme", c'est simplement parce que je compte l'utiliser à mes fins. »

languages.text: “即使我真的拥有这‘一星火焰’，那也仅仅是因为我，想用它来达到我自己的目的。”
languages.original_text: "Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."

traits.locale_text: “即使我真的拥有这‘一星火焰’，那也仅仅是因为我，想用它来达到我自己的目的。”

languages.text: "Selbst, wenn ich diesen 'Splitter der Flamme' besitze, dann doch nur, weil ich ihn für meine eigenen Zwecke einsetzen möchte."
languages.original_text: "Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst, wenn ich diese 'Zunge der Flamme' besitze, dann doch nur, weil ich sie für meine eigenen Zwecke einsetzen möchte."

languages.text: «Aunque yo posea esta "mota de llama", solo la uso para mi propio beneficio».
languages.original_text: "Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque yo posea esta "chispa de llama", solo la uso para mi propio beneficio».

languages.text: 「仮に私が『炎の一部』を所有していたとしても、それは自分の目的のために使いたいからにすぎない」
languages.original_text: "Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."

traits.locale_text: 「仮に私が『炎の一部』を所有していたとしても、それは自分の目的のために使いたいからにすぎない」

languages.text: "Bahsettiğin 'alev zerresine' sahipsem dahi bunun tek sebebi, kendi amaçlarım için kullanmak istememdir."
languages.original_text: "Even if I do possess this 'mote of flame,' it is only because I wish to use it for my own ends."

traits.locale_text: "Bahsettiğin 'alev zerresine' sahipsem dahi tek sebebi kendi amaçlarım için kullanmak istememdir."
